thread.title: Meet Brian Orser, Pyeongchang’s Busiest Figure Skating Coach

author: Louise Radnofsky
title: Meet Brian Orser, Pyeongchang’s Busiest Figure Skating Coach
text:
GANGNEUNG, South Korea—There have been some busy figure skating coaches at the Pyeongchang Games who carefully shepherd an athlete from practice to rest to competition and back again. There are even busier coaches juggling two or three athletes. And then there’s Brian Orser.
Orser trained Japan’s Yuzuru Hanyu to his second straight gold medal, in the men’s singles event here. He also trained Javier Fernandez to a bronze medal in the same event—Spain’s first ever in figure skating.
...
